09431DDE.Line13.8CA44: Sandstorm, eh? The others must’ve turned you down. Told you some rubbish about a sorcerer I’ll wager! (cackles)

27324130.VoiceDir19.6D03F: The last two sentences are spoken to the player

3D2C10E2.Line17.8CA44: Ah! This is wonderful! Like old times, eh, Deckard?

597949AB.VoiceDir13.8CA44: extremely amused. You're the worlds funniest man

5A43C04B.Line1.8CA44: Enh? Whassat? I'm paid up. Leave me be.

6F2A2F5B.Line11.6D03F: No, Deckard is gone. My name is Lorath. We need your help passing through the sandstorm to the north.

8E2CB34F.Line5.8CA44: Hmm? It can’t be… can it? Is that the symbol of the Ho... Hora... uh...

A3379760.Line15.8CA44: Well, what can a sorcerer do to me that time hasn't already! (laughs) Yes, yes! I’ll help! There's an old chapel near there, an auspicious spot to begin a new adventure!

C215A653.Line9.8CA44: Yes! Horadrim! Deckard? Deckard Cain?! Can it be you, old friend? It’s me! Meshif!

C94D2678.VoiceDir1.8CA44: Annoyed. Groggy. Someone just woke you up from a narcotic-induced sleep

D6FC1563.Line19.6D03F: Good. Gather whatever you need. I'll fetch Taissa and meet you there.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: We're not here to collect. We need--

FD36197C.VoiceDir5.8CA44: groggy, confused. You're seeing a symbol pinned to a visitor's cloak you barely remember from your youth
